scripts.version:show:
echo '

		Extension is currently in version '$(echo $npm_package_version)'

'
scripts.version:upgrade:
echo '
>### ```version '$VERSION'```
>* '$CHANGELOG >> changelog.md && git add changelog.md && git commit -m 'Update Changelog' && yarn version --new-version $VERSION
scripts.build:staging: NODE_ENV=staging webpack && mkdir build && cross-env crx pack staging -o build/$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version-staging.crx -p key.pem
scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production webpack && mkdir build && cross-env crx pack production -o build/$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.crx -p key.pem
